Title: AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR A NEW TIME LIMIT FOR THE PAYMENT OF THE TAXES CORRESPONDING TO THE YEARS NINETEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-EIGHT AND NINETEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-NINE.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 619, June 05, 1941 ]
AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR A NEW TIME LIMIT FOR THE PAYMENT OF THE TAXES CORRESPONDING TO THE YEARS NINETEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-EIGHT AND NINETEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-NINE.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. Section one of Commonwealth Act Numbered Four hundred and sixty-four, as amended by Commonwealth Act Numbered Five hundred and twenty-four, is further amended to read as follows:
"Section 1. All the unpaid real property taxes due on any real property forfeited to the provincial or city government on or prior to January first, nineteen hundred and thirty-nine, and all penalties that have become due thereon and remaining unpaid are remitted, if fifty per centum of the tax corresponding to the year nineteen hundred and thirty-eight, and the entire tax corresponding to the year nineteen hundred and thirty-nine had b?en paid on or before June thirtieth, nineteen hundred and forty.ℒαwρhi৷"
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, June 5, 1941.
